name: Patient Z
description:
Controls:

  • WASD to move/push patients (it's not a bug, it's a feature!)
  • Space to pick up, drop, and use items

Gameplay:

  • Save as many patients as you can by fulfilling their needs (think Overcooked!) before they turn into zombies
  • Zombies only target the doctor, but if they collide with any patients, they also become zombified

Source: danceswithpixels/gamedevtv-jam-2022 (github.com)

Credits/Devs: Edgar Lugo, Neil Kotikawatte, Jason Zhang
